column1: Section 34 (6) and (7) of the VAT Act which provides as follows;

column2: Commissioner-General  may  cause  further  inquiry  to  be
made  by  an  Assessor,  other  than  the  Assessor  who  made
such assessment against which the appeal in preferred and
if in the course of such inquiry an agreement is reached as
necessary adjustment of the assessment shall be made.
7) Where no agreement is reached between the appellant
and the Assessor in the manner provided in subsection (6),
